description: With the power of the Hulk, and the intellect of Bruce Banner, Maestro has survived wars, nuclear attacks and countless assassination attempts from all across time. Now he moves from one timeline to another, defeating any he deems a worthy foe and taking their prized weapons as personal trophies. With so few who could stand against him, Maestro has now set his sights on a much more grand scale. He aims to take over the Contest and prove he is the most powerful champion in all the universe.

sections.name: Always Active
sections.description:
An enhanced immune system and advanced armaments provide full Immunity to Poison, Shock, and Incinerate.

Maestro has given up his Superiority in order to become the most powerful Cosmic, gaining an extra +800.8 Attack Rating against Tech Champions.

sections.name: Neutronium – Max 40
sections.description:
Maestro gains 1 Neutronium per second, disabled during Superior Rage. He gains them 25% slower against Mystic Champions.

Second Medium Attacks grant Maestro 3 Neutronium.

After being knocked down, Maestro cannot gain Neutronium for 6 seconds. This cannot be triggered again for 8 seconds after it expires. If one of Maestro’s Buffs expires naturally, these durations are removed.

If one of Maestro’s Buffs expires naturally, he cannot gain Neutronium for 8 seconds.

Whenever Maestro is Immune to an effect or has a Buff Nullified, gain 3 Neutronium. This has a 5 second cooldown.
sections.note: This is Maestro’s bread and butter. His Rage is inevitable but prevent it as long as you can, or force him to end his own Buffs to slow his Neutronium build up as long as possible.

sections.name: ISO-8 Buffs
sections.description:
ISO-8 Buffs cannot be affected by Ability Accuracy and last for 36 seconds.

At 10 Neutronium, gain a Glancing Buff causing all incoming Basic Attacks to have a 100% chance to Glance.

At 20 Neutronium, gain a Pierce Buff of 118.42 potency.

At 30 Neutronium, gain a Cosmic Radiation Buff. While active, Opponents near Maestro take 400.4 Energy Damage per second. While Maestro is suffering from Atrophy, reduce the potency of the Energy Damage by 50%.

When Maestro would gain an ISO-8 Buff, retrigger all other ISO-8 Buffs from previous thresholds.
sections.note: Key to note that Maestro will only Glance basic hits while his Glancing is active. Make sure to keep a keen eye on which Buffs he’s got active at all times.

sections.name: Superior Rage
sections.description:
At 40 Neutronium, Maestro enters Superior Rage and gains +1001 Attack Rating.

During Superior Rage, 1 Neutronium expires every second. While Maestro is suffering from Atrophy they expire 50% faster.

When entering Superior Rage, remove all personal Buffs and gain a Passive copy retaining the same potency and effects.

When knocked down during Superior Rage, Maestro loses 5 Neutronium.

Superior Rage ends when Maestro has 0 Neutronium, removing all personal Buffs, Passives, and any cooldowns for Neutronium.

Maestro cannot gain Neutronium for 6 seconds after Superior Rage ends.
sections.note: You won’t like Maestro when he’s angry.

1.name: Triplicate ISO Blast
1.description:
Each hit deals a burst of 800.8 Energy Damage. Deal an additional burst of Energy Damage for each active personal Fury effect. As a Defender this Damage scales with Base Attack Only.

Superior Rage: This can trigger through Block.

2.name: Soulsword & Godslayer
2.description:
On activation, for each active ISO-8 Buff or Passive, gain a Fury Buff increasing Attack Rating by +480.48 for 36 seconds. Max stacks: 3.

Superior Rage: Gain Fury Passives instead of Buffs, and gain an Energy Penetration Passive causing all attacks to ignore 50% of the Opponent’s current Energy Resistance for 36 seconds.
2.note: Use Medium attacks to race to Rage and use the Special 2 to gain max Fury passives and Energy Resistance. Once done pepper the opponent with tons of Burst Damage from the Special 1.

3.name: ISO Power Unleashed
3.description:
Gain 20 Neutronium.

Superior Rage: Inflict a Stun Debuff for 4 seconds.

signature.name: Neutronium Might
signature.description:
Activating a Special Attack grants an additional 3 Neutronium, as well as refresh Personal Fury Effects.

Each Neutronium also grants Maestro +[2.3-19.02 standard] Block Penetration.

sections.name: Special Attacks
sections.description:
Activating a Special Attack grants 2 Neutronium.

Superior Rage: On activation, inflict a Root Passive until the final hit of the Special Attack. This will not trigger while Maestro is suffering from Atrophy.
